subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Sean Casey’s bases-loaded walk capped a four-run eighth inning and the host Boston Red Sox pulled off another late rally Sunday afternoon, beating the Texas Rangers, 6-5, after Manny Ramírez was ejected in the second.
snippet: Sean Casey’s bases-loaded walk capped a four-run eighth inning and the host Boston Red Sox pulled off another late rally Sunday afternoon, beating the Texas Rangers, 6-5, after Manny Ramírez was ejected in the second.
